name: Preview Form
author: DevUI

sections.description:
The Preview form for Contact Form 7.

The plugin allows using

  1. Preview form in admin.
  2. Preview form in site (front end).

Documentation

HELP TRANSLATE THE PLUGIN

You can help translate Preview Form plugin on translate.wordpress.org.
sections.installation:
Thank you for your interest in Preview Form.

Minimum requirements.

  • WordPress 3.0+
  • PHP 5.x.
  • MySQL 5.x.

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
e.g.

  1. Upload folder ‘plugin-name’ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the “Preview Form” plugin through the plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to edit form in ‘Contact Form 7’.
  4. Click Preview tab.

If any problem occurs, please read documents WordPress.
